instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Charging , Orange Light, But doesn't  show its charging in macOS
threads.message:
<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Charging , Orange Light, But doesn't  show its charging in macOS

Percentage just continues to rise , is this just a software error?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Charging , Orange Light, But doesn't  show its charging in macOS
threads.message:
What shows OSX then?
Check power in system report.
Machine works on battery only?
Does the percentage correctly decreases then?

Orange light doesn't mean charging from 2013.
You will get orange light without battery too; it will switch to green at full battery, 100% level.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Charging , Orange Light, But doesn't  show its charging in macOS
threads.message: If the battery percentage increases, then it's definitely an OS thing.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Charging , Orange Light, But doesn't  show its charging in macOS
threads.message:
Yes it goes up,

In in recovery mode completely normal - it shows normal charging

but in the main OS percentage goes up  but it doesn't say it is charging

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Charging , Orange Light, But doesn't  show its charging in macOS
threads.message:
Did you try another OSX?
Don't you have a preinstalled OSX pendrive?
Does it work on battery only?
